SEARCH
Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.model

Class Loan

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.model.Loan
public class Loan extends Object
The Loan class models a Loan of a Book for a Patron. The class has 6 variables, 5 of which are required to construct an instance. They are as follows:

  • id: Integer (required) - The primary key for each instance of the class. Used to search for specific instances.

  • patron: Patron (required) - The pointer to a specific Patron.

  • book: Book (required) - The pointer to the loaned Book.

  • startDate: LocalDate (required) - The starting date of the loan.

  • dueDate: LocalDate (required) - The due date of the loan

  • completed: Boolean - An internal flag to track the current status of the loan.

  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(Integer id, Patron patron, Book book, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate dueDate)
      Create a new Loan instance. The constructor initialises a new Book instance using all the mandatory fields of the class.
      Parameters:
      id - - the ID of the loan..
      patron - - the patron that borrowed the book.
      book - - the book that is on loan.
      startDate - - the start date of the loan as LocalDate.
      dueDate - - the due date of the loan as LocalDate.

    • getStatus

      public boolean getStatus()
      Fetches the current status of the loan. This function is used to grab the status of the loan, important when tracking loan history.
      Returns:
      true for a completed loan, false for an outstanding loan.

    • completeLoan

      public void completeLoan()
      Sets the status of the loan to complete. This function sets the completed flag to true.

    • parse

      public static Loan parse(Library library, String loanString) throws NumberFormatException, LibraryException

      Turns a Loan object into a String, Used when saving Loan objects. 

       |                            String format                           |
 +----------+-----------+---------+------------+----------+-----------+
 |  Loan ID | Patron ID | Book ID | Start Date | Due Date | Completed |
 +----------+-----------+---------+------------+----------+-----------+
 |    00    |     01    |    02   | 2012-12-21 |2025-12-31|   false   |
 +----------+-----------+---------+------------+----------+-----------+
      Parameters:
      library - - The main library instance for the program.
      loanString - - A string representation of a Loan object.
      Returns:
      A new Loan object matching the string representation.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException
      LibraryException
